Title: Maximum Capacity
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Hilary Florido, Katie Mitroff, Rebecca Sugar, Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story), Kat Morris (story)
Actors: Eric Bell Jr., Zach Callison, Michaela Dietz, Estelle
Plot: Maximum Capacity: A garage sale reunites Greg and Amethyst with their favorite cheesy sitcom - Lil' Butler. / Marble Madness: Steven and the Gems encounter another droid from space.
